csvImport.pageDescription: Upload your bank CSV export or transaction history file to import transactions into your account.

steps.uploadDescription: Select your CSV file to begin
steps.mappingDescription: Match CSV columns to transaction fields

fileUpload.description: Select your CSV file to import transactions
fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here

errors.invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload a CSV file.
errors.parseFailed: Failed to parse file. Please check the format and try again.

columnMapping.description: Map your CSV columns to the required fields

review.duplicatesHint: Uncheck rows you want to import anyway

results.successDescription: All transactions have been successfully imported.
results.partialDescription: Some transactions could not be imported.
results.batchIdDescription: Use this ID to find all transactions from this import.

transactionTypeMapping.title: Transaction Type Determination
transactionTypeMapping.methodDescription: Choose how transaction types (income/expense) should be determined
transactionTypeMapping.columnDescription: Select the CSV column that contains transaction type information

methodOptions.amountSign: From Amount Sign (negative = expense, positive = income)

transactionTypeMapping.amountSignInfo: ℹ️ Transaction types will be determined automatically: negative amounts = expenses, positive amounts = income

currencyMapping.title: Currency Assignment
currencyMapping.optionLabel: How do you want to assign currencies?
currencyMapping.optionDescription: Choose how currencies should be assigned to imported transactions
currencyMapping.columnDescription: Select the CSV column that contains currency codes
currencyMapping.currencyDescription: All imported transactions will use this currency

methodOptions.existingCurrency: Use same currency for all transactions

currencyMapping.dataSourceColumnInfo: ℹ️ Each transaction will use the currency specified in the selected CSV column

accountAssignment.title: Account Assignment
accountAssignment.howToAssign: How do you want to assign accounts?
accountAssignment.description: Choose how accounts should be assigned to imported transactions
accountAssignment.columnDescription: Select the CSV column that contains account names
accountAssignment.singleAccountDescription: All imported transactions will be assigned to this account
accountAssignment.mapOnNextStep: You'll map each CSV account to your existing accounts on the next step

options.mapToExisting: Map each CSV account to existing accounts (on next step)
options.assignToSingle: Assign all to single existing account

accountMappingTable.title: Account Mapping
accountMappingTable.description: Map CSV account names to your existing accounts or create new ones. Only accounts with matching currency will be shown.
accountMappingTable.noMatchingCurrency: No accounts available with matching currency ({currency})
accountMappingTable.willBeCreated: New account "{name}" will be created with {currency} currency

categoryMappingTable.title: Category Mapping
categoryMappingTable.description: Map CSV category names to your existing categories or create new ones.

categoryAssignment.title: Category Assignment
categoryAssignment.howToAssign: How do you want to assign categories?
categoryAssignment.description: Choose how categories should be assigned to imported transactions
categoryAssignment.columnDescription: Select the CSV column that contains category names
categoryAssignment.singleCategoryDescription: All imported transactions will be assigned to this category
categoryAssignment.mapOnNextStep: You'll map each CSV category to your existing categories on the next step
categoryAssignment.createFromCSV: New high-level categories will be created automatically from unique values in your CSV file

options.mapToExisting: Map each CSV category to existing categories (on next step)
options.createNew: Create new categories from CSV values
options.assignToSingle: Assign all to single existing category
